tweets.text:
@VictorMondayE @Become_Viral Here are the practical steps to build a 6-figure faceless YT channel:

1. Choose evergreen niche (finance facts, history, tech tips) - use stock footage/AI visuals only.
2. Script with ChatGPT/Claude, voiceover via ElevenLabs or Murf.
3. Edit in CapCut or Premiere: 8-12 min
